text: Kolya () is a 1996 Czech drama movie directed by Jan Svěrák and starring Zdeněk Svěrák, Andrey Khalimon, Libuše Šafránková, Stella Zázvorková. It was distributed by Miramax and won an Academy Award in 1997. ==Other websites== * * Category:1996 drama movies Category:Czech drama movies Category:French drama movies Category:1990s British drama movies Category:Movies directed by Jan Svěrák
title: Kolya
